title: Travis Scott breaks silence and says rumors he cheated on Kylie Jenner are 'just simply not true'
text:
Travis Scott has finally broken his silence amid his split with partner Kylie Jenner, which was announced earlier this week.

The couple had apparently separated weeks before making the announcement, which was followed with rumors that Scott was cheating.

But the Astroworld artist took to his Instagram story Friday to deny the rumors and clear the air.

Breaking silence: Travis Scott took to his Instagram story Friday to deny the rumors that he cheated on Kylie Jenner, with whom he's currently taking a break

He wrote: 'It’s really affecting when u see false things said about u once again these false stories about me cheating are just simply not true. Focusing on life, music, and family at this moment is what’s real.'

This comes just days after his split with Jenner, 22, was announced, and he was subsequently linked to model Rojean Kar, 27, who goes by the name YungSweetRo on Instagram.

Meanwhile, Kylie has been rumored to be rekindling things with ex Tyga, after she was seen outside Tyga's recording studio at 2 am this week.

But she shot down those rumors on Thursday, tweeting: 'The internet makes everything 100 times more dramatic than what it really is.

False: He wrote: 'It’s really affecting when u see false things said about u once again these false stories about me cheating are just simply not true. Focusing on life, music, and family at this moment is what’s real'

Rumored affair: This comes just days after his split with Jenner, 22, was announced, and he was subsequently linked to model Rojean Kar, 27

'There was no "2am date with Tyga." You see me drop two of my friends off at a studio that he happened to be at.'

Kylie further cleared the air that she and Travis are on good terms, writing: 'Travis and I are on great terms and our main focus right now is Stormi!! our friendship and our daughter is priority.'

Meanwhile, Kylie is also said to be on friendly terms with Tyga, as they even came face-to-face at Sofia Richie's 21st birthday celebrations in August.

Rekindling romance? Meanwhile, Kylie has been rumored to be rekindling things with ex Tyga, after she was seen outside Tyga's recording studio at 2 am this week

Not true: But she shot down those rumors on Thursday, tweeting: 'The internet makes everything 100 times more dramatic than what it really is. There was no "2am date with Tyga." You see me drop two of my friends off at a studio that he happened to be at'

News of Kylie and Travis' decision to put their relationship on pause broke on Tuesday afternoon.

The couple began dating at Coachella in 2017, and within weeks, she was pregnant with their now 20-month-old daughter Stormi - who they are said to be amicably co-parenting.

The last time the couple were pictured together was at the August 27 premiere of the Netflix documentary, Travis Scott: Look Mom I Can Fly, which chronicles the rapper's personal and professional life.

Taking a break: The last time Travis and Kylie were pictured together was at the August 27 premiere of the Netflix documentary, Travis Scott: Look Mom I Can Fly, which chronicles the rapper's personal and professional life
description: He posted to his Instagram story after rumors of his affair: 'It's really affecting when u see false things said about u once again these false stories about me cheating are just simply not true.'
